bug.author: g-simmons
bug.summary: ImportError: cannot import name 'collections_abc' from 'six.moves' (unknown location) on label-studio init labeling_project
bug.description:
Describe the bug Hi all,
I created a new conda environment (conda create -n labelstudio), activated the environment (conda activate labelstudio), installed label-studio (pip install labelstudio) try to init a project (label-studio init labeling_project), and received the following error.
I thought maybe this was because I omitted specifying the python version when creating the conda env, so I did
conda install python=3.8, re-ran label-studio init labeling_project and got the same error.
FIX: this was solved by pip install -U six To Reproduce Above Expected behavior No error on label-studio init labeling_project Screenshots <denchmark-code>Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Users/gabe/opt/miniconda3/envs/labelstudio/bin/label-studio", line 5, in <module> from label_studio.server import main File "/Users/gabe/opt/miniconda3/envs/labelstudio/lib/python3.8/site-packages/label_studio/server.py", line 50, in <module> from label_studio.utils.uri_resolver import resolve_task_data_uri File "/Users/gabe/opt/miniconda3/envs/labelstudio/lib/python3.8/site-packages/label_studio/utils/uri_resolver.py", line 8, in <module> from google.cloud import storage as gs File "/Users/gabe/opt/miniconda3/envs/labelstudio/lib/python3.8/site-packages/google/cloud/storage/__init__.py", line 38, in <module> from google.cloud.storage.batch import Batch File "/Users/gabe/opt/miniconda3/envs/labelstudio/lib/python3.8/site-packages/google/cloud/storage/batch.py", line 31, in <module> from google.cloud.storage._http import Connection File "/Users/gabe/opt/miniconda3/envs/labelstudio/lib/python3.8/site-packages/google/cloud/storage/_http.py", line 17, in <module> from google.cloud import _http File "/Users/gabe/opt/miniconda3/envs/labelstudio/lib/python3.8/site-packages/google/cloud/_http.py", line 22, in <module> from six.moves import collections_abc ImportError: cannot import name 'collections_abc' from 'six.moves' (unknown location) </denchmark-code>
Environment (please complete the following information):
OS: OSX Catalina Browser haven't opened the browser yet :) Version: Label Studio version: 0.7.4.post0

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/g-simmons>@g-simmons</denchmark-link> It's known issue, we fixed it in release/0.7.5. Or you can use 0.7.4.post1: <denchmark-code>pip install label-studio==0.7.4.post1 </denchmark-code>
Oh ok no worries - already resolved, feel free to close, just wanted to make sure you were aware. Loving the tool so far üëç üëç
